name: Rolly Worms
description:
The worms have invaded the apple tree! Roll down the branch and onto the path, but beware of the gaps along the way. Tap to make the worms pop out of the apple and jump over the openings!

Collect coins to unlock the full cast of crazy worms!

FEATURES
◉ Simple one-tap controls
◉ Addictive and unique gameplay
◉ Vibrant cartoon art style
◉ Crazy cast of characters including Ninja, Zombie, and Cowboy Worms!
◉ Hilarious animations for each worm
◉ Compete for the top-score on Game Center leaderboards
